---
id: CancelCurrentPendingOrder
title: Cancel the Current Pending Order
sidebar_label: Cancel the Current Pending Order
sidebar_position: 8
description: /spot/v4/open-order
---

**Type:** DELETE

**Description:** `/spot/v4/open-order`

### Limit Flow Rules

10/s/apikey

> **Note:** The parameters should be placed in the request body in the form of JSON.

### Parameters

| Name | Type | Mandatory | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `symbol` | string | Yes |  | Trading pair, if not filled in, represents all |
| `bizType` | string | Yes |  | SPOT, LEVER |
| `side` | string | Yes |  | BUY, SELL |

### Response Example

```json title="Response"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {}
}
```
